tool.name: OGS: geometryToGmshGeo
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'geometryToGmshGeo'.
tool.command: geometryToGmshGeo --output '$output' --input '$input' #if str($max_points_in_quadtree_leaf): --max_points_in_quadtree_leaf '$max_points_in_quadtree_leaf' #end if #if str($mesh_density_scaling_at_points): --mesh_density_scaling_at_points '$mesh_density_scaling_at_points' #end if #if str($mesh_density_scaling_at_stations): --mesh_density_scaling_at_stations '$mesh_density_scaling_at_stations' #end if #if str($average_point_density): --average_point_density '$average_point_density' #end if $homogeneous #if str($write_merged_geometries): --write_merged_geometries '$write_merged_geometries' #end if

param.name: average_point_density
param.label: average point density
param.help: average point density / average edge length as a positive floating point number

param.name: write_merged_geometries
param.label: write merged geometries
param.help: file name for the output of the internal created geometry (*.gml) (useful for debugging the data)

tool.help: This tool runs the **geometryToGmshGeo** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
